bboxes.raw_text:
There's lots that can go wrong,
obviously.


So when you shop all three, re-
member that Motorola gives you
the extra protection of a full year
guarantee on all the parts and all
the tubes for every single model
in our entire line of black-and-
white sets. not just for 80 days.
*THE MoToRoLA GUARANTEE
Manufacturers guarantee covers
a full year replacement or repair
of any component part proved de-
fective in normal use. Arranged
through selling dealer. Labor
extra.

tubes are stressed or blasted" at
operating powers up to twice the
normal rated powers. In other &C
tolerated torture tests we use a
control system that in 48 hours
shows to our satisfaction how each
tube should perform after thou
sands of hours of home use.


WHAT CAN GO WRONG?


Inside black and white television
sets are receiving tubes, resistors,
capacitors, transformers, coils and
speakers :. and when they fail to
do their job, you can have trouble
with your set even if the picture
tube is in perfect condition.

WHEN LITTLE TUBES FAIL


YOU'VE GOT TROUBLE
]. FIip-FIop Trouble


Some tubes and parts help to clean
up the signal. They are the clipper,
noise inverter and ACC tubes. If
they fade, you may get flip-flop
pictures. These tubes and every
other tube in Motorola's black
and white television sets are
guaranteed for a full year not
for just 80 days.


2. "SnoW" Trouble


The little tubes have many jobs to
do +. one of which is to take the
signal from your antenna and
give it a boost. If it goofs, you may
get snow. Ours does an excellent
job of minimizing snow-and it's
guaranteed for a full year,. not
just for 80 days.


3. Contrast Trouble


Failure in the contrast function

Even though these little tubes are
frequently fragile, they must be
able to "take il" We take a ran
dom sampling of tubes and test
them carefully; by visual test, cleo
tronic test, tap test, blast test. In
blast testing, for example, sample

may give you a weak, foggy pic
ture. Motorola gives you the pro-
lection of a full years guarantee
ON these tubes instead of 80
days.


T. Other Performance troubles
When the vertical hold or the hori-
zontal hold begins to slip, when
the sound turns fuzzy, or when you
keep the, sound but lose the picture
you've got trouble. The little
tubes and electronic parts that we
use are covered by a full years
guarantee. not just for 80 days.

When you get bad picture on your back-and-white
televison set-what went wrong? Most of the time


it's not the picture tube It's the little tubes and other
electronic parts and the oueraU performance of your
TV set can be better than the performance of the
smallest tube electronic part That's why exert
much time and effort to see to it that these little
tubes and electronc parts are truly reliable.
